function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality due to pollutants such as volatile organic compounds, carbon monoxide, nitrogen dioxide, and particulates","Impact":"Harmful effects on occupant health, including respiratory issues and potential long-term health consequences","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective ventilation systems, use of air purifiers, and regular monitoring of indoor air quality","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with air filtration, monitoring devices for indoor air quality","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on ventilation and indoor air quality, exacerbated by the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, including contagious diseases like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increased focus on ventilation systems, regular maintenance and inspections, adoption of air quality guidelines and standards","Technologies":"HVAC systems with enhanced ventilation, air quality monitoring and control systems","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Government agencies, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate attention to musculoskeletal pain and mental health issues related to building design","Impact":"Increase in musculoskeletal pain, stress, depression, and anxiety among building occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporation of ergonomic design principles, promotion of biophilic design, provision of mental health support services","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture and workspace design, biophilic elements in building architecture, mental health support resources","People":"Building occupants, especially those prone to musculoskeletal pain and mental health challenges","Owner":"Architects, building designers, employers"}]}
